update LST_IQP_INFO set APPLY_STATUS = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COVER_CREATE_STATUS = #{coverCreateStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where IQP_LOAN_SERNO = #{iqpLoanSerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cover_create_status !='03'

select
from LST_IQP_INFO where IQP_LOAN_SERNO = #{applNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ISPERMIT = '1' and cover_create_status = '00'

select
from LST_IQP_INFO where IQP_LOAN_SERNO = #{applNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cover_create_status not in ('03')
select ins_name,prd_name,c_appnt,prd_pk,prd_type from prd_basicinfo where prd_code = #{prdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select t.actorname from s_user t where t.actorno = #{inputId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select t.seal_status,t.signed_pdf_url from lst_iqp_seal t where t.list_serno = #{listSerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ((select b.term from lst_iqp_info b where b.serno = #{serno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) - (select count(b.lst_serno) from acc_fee_mtd_plan b where b.lst_serno = #{serno,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) as SURRENDER_NO from dual
